casebody.data:
Ryan MENARD, BY his conservator, Shelly MENARD, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Terry R. IMIG and Sharryl Ann Everson, Defendants,
and
Macomb County Department of Roads and County of Macomb, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 158563
COA: 336220 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 3, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellant to extend the time for filing her supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before July 24, 2019.
